vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.16;
father of: Hezekiah (H2396I)
§ Ater = "binder"
1) an exiled descendant of Hezekiah
2) an exiled Levite porter (perhaps same as 1)
3) a chief Israelite who sealed Nehemiah's covenant
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   jefe de familia; post exílico; (b)   jefe de familia; porteros; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞特 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "束縛者"
1) 被擄歸回的一個家族, 希西家的子孫
2) 被擄歸回的一個利未人守門人 (可能跟 1) 相同)
3) 一個以色列首領, 在尼希米的約上簽名
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚特 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "束缚者"
1) 被掳归回的一个家族, 希西家的子孙
2) 被掳归回的一个利未人守门人 (可能跟 1) 相同)
3) 一个以色列首领, 在尼希米的约上签名

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.42
§ Ater = "binder"
1) an exiled descendant of Hezekiah
2) an exiled Levite porter (perhaps same as 1)
3) a chief Israelite who sealed Nehemiah's covenant

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.17
§ Ater = "binder"
1) an exiled descendant of Hezekiah
2) an exiled Levite porter (perhaps same as 1)
3) a chief Israelite who sealed Nehemiah's covenant
